data.name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Magical Sound Adventure -Dark
data.detailed_description:
This collection contains all the music needed for general platform games, that covers the Opening to the Ending!
The collection is themed around a dark fantasy world, which is ideal for action games with a sad and serious atmosphere.
Of course, as with Pixel Game Maker MV, you can use it as BGM for not only platform games, but also for a variety of other game genres. The sky is the limit!

Content:
1: Elegy (Opening)
2: The black cloak goes (Stage)
3: Drive under the moon (Stage)
4: Icy eyes (Stage)
5: Setting sun (Stage)
6: The Trapped (Stage)
7: Beginning of the End (Stage)
8: Guardian (Battle)
9: Defeat your nemesis! (Battle)
10: Advent (Battle)
11: Spinning Hope (Stage Clear)
12: Despair (Miss)
13: Rest in Peace (Game Over)
14: Recollection (Continue)
15: At the End of Time (Ending)
